title: Strengthening Business Competencies: Personalized Algebra Learning for Practitioners: Intelligent Tutoring Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can solve algebra problems linked to personal interests with over 80% accuracy using an Intelligent Tutoring System (ITS).
Learners can achieve 90% engagement in personalized problem sets generated based on interest analysis surveys.
Learners can distinguish between deep/shallow-linked problem types in ITS, select appropriate types based on quantitative engagement levels, and improve learning efficiency by 20%.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
